title: Reliance Capital Administrator seeks 10 days extension from RBI to transfer assets to Hinduja Group
description: The National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) Mumbai, while approving the resolution plan on February 27, directed IndusInd International Holdings Ltd to implement it within 90 days ending May 27.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
